author: Matt Bassil
description:
What are the best card games for adults in 2025? Card gaming goes beyond the 52-card deck these days, and we've tested dozens of modern, brand-name titles to recommend you the best picks in every genre - from 15-minute family fun card games, right through to collectible strategy games that could be your new full-time hobby.

We review this guide every month, considering a range of beloved and new card games for speed and ease of play, tactical depth, compelling themes, and value for money. To see how we choose our favorites, and some extra buying guidance, follow the FAQ links below. For a chunkier tabletop experience, try our guides to the best board games and new board games - or use our huge collection of Charades ideas for a super easy, free game night.

Cont
title: The best card games in 2025

author: Chloe Ward
description:
I can only imagine the tension in the air as the rebels watched the Stormtroopers laser their way through the door of the Tantive IV. The  anxiety as smoke billowed and blaster shots lit up the bright white corridor… before Darth Vader stepped across the threshold. Lego has captures this iconic cinematic moment in glorious brick form with the Boarding the Tantive IV set. And if, like me, you lowkey need this Lego Star Wars set in your life, it’s currently 24% off over at Amazon.

Continue reading This is not a trap - this Lego Star Wars Episode 4 set now has a huge discount
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Biggest LEGO sets, LEGO sets for adults, Best Star Wars LEGO sets
title: This is not a trap - this Lego Star Wars Episode 4 set now has a huge discount

author: Alex Evans
description:
Spicy Truth or Dare questions can turn a classic playground game into a hilarious adult affair. Playing is easy – each player in turn chooses to take on a truth or a dare, and everyone else decides on a cheeky question or unusual challenge. The hardest part of the game, however, is coming up with enough spicy ideas. This guide offers 175 of the best Truth or Dare questions for adults – plus 65 dares that run from the silly to the scorching, as an added bonus!

Continue reading 175 best dirty Truth or Dare questions for spicy game nights
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: 175 best dirty Truth or Dare questions for spicy game nights

author: Alex Evans
description:
What are the best board games to play in 2025? As tabletop game specialists, we at Wargamer play day in, day out, as well as reviewing the latest titles rigorously – so we can confidently bring you this ultimate list of our 15 top board games, selected to cover multiple genres, group sizes, age ranges, and experience levels.

Our selections include new board games as well as established classics. However, the best board games of all time look different for everyone, so we've put a lot of thought into our selections - click on the links below to find out how we test and choose the winners, plus some extra buying tips. If you specifically want a game for two, try our expert guide to the best board games for couples – or branch out with our updated list of the best card games
title: The 15 best board games in 2025 - reviewed by our experts

author: Matt Bassil
description:
What are the best MTG cards ever made? There have been many, many Magic: The Gathering cards printed over the years, but most of them are destined to sit in dusty drawers, untouched and unloved. Not these all-stars. Here, we’ve drawn up a list of the most powerful and popular, old and new, from all of Magic: The Gathering's many formats.

We’ve looked back across countless MTG sets, from recent releases all the way back to Alpha, to find the coolest, most jaw-droppingly powerful cards in all of Magic: The Gathering. Some of these can still be played in your MTG Arena decks, though several have also done time on an MTG banlist or two.

Continue reading
title: The 16 best MTG cards of all time

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Looking for the best MTG planeswalker cards? Since their introduction in 2007, Wizards of the Coast has created a lot of planeswalkers, but only a small portion of them are worth slotting into your decks. After many hours of deck tinkering, we've put together a list of the best Magic: The Gathering planeswalkers ever printed.

Continue reading The 18 best MTG planeswalker cards
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: The 18 best MTG planeswalker cards

author: Will Freeman
description:
What are the most expensive Lego sets in the world? It's a busy market; some rare Lego sets are sought after as new-in-box collectibles, while others fetch thousands of dollars just for including one or two individual parts not found elsewhere. We've dug through the lot to compile this list of the most expensive Lego on the market - ancient and modern.

If you haven't got new-car money to drop on a Lego relic, but just want a top-tier set to order today, skip down our list to the most expensive sets you can buy right now. Alternatively, you might find something in our guides to the best Lego sets for adults and the absolute biggest Lego sets ever.

Continue reading The 20 most expensive Lego sets of all time<
title: The 20 most expensive Lego sets of all time

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Critical Role’s campaign four announcement was surprisingly divisive. When the actual play behemoth announced it was playing several more years of Dungeons and Dragons, early adopters of its in-house RPG, Daggerheart, were loudly disappointed. ‘This is a betrayal’, many cried online. ‘This is a vote of no confidence in the very system that Critical Role helped design’.

Continue reading Critical Role picking DnD over Daggerheart is not a betrayal, it's just business
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Critical Role picking DnD over Daggerheart is not a betrayal, it's just business

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Owlcat Games has shared the first development diary for its upcoming game Warhammer 40k: Dark Heresy with press, and revealed that a truly out there villain from the original Dark Heresy tabletop RPG will make its return. The Tyrant Star is an impossible entity, a stellar body that appears and disappears in the skies of worlds within the Imperium, spreading madness and killing billions - and it’s going to be your job to deal with it.

Continue reading One of Warhammer 40k Dark Heresy's villains is a sun that wants to kill everyone
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: One of Warhammer 40k Dark Heresy's villains is a sun that wants to kill everyone

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Let me tell you about the weirdest device I’ve ever been given to test in the name of miniature wargames. The Saltgator looks like a French press designed for Robocop, an irregular hexagonal cylinder with a syringe plunger at one end and a glass viewing window along one face. It’s billed as a ‘desktop safe’ device for melting plastic and injecting it into moulds, primarily marketed at anglers making soft fishing lures - but you better believe I’m going to ignore the manufacturer specifications and try to use it to make wargames terrain.

Continue reading Can I really make tabletop wargame bits with this weird fishing gizmo?
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games</
title: Can I really make tabletop wargame bits with this weird fishing gizmo?

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Satchel Quest, a board game where you play adorable animal dungeoneers, began crowdfunding on Kickstarter on August 19. Its bag-building mechanics create a unique puzzle, as your randomly-drawn tokens trigger a range of effects as you traverse a dungeon floor by floor. Publisher Weird City Games aimed to raise $20,000 for production, but the crowdfunder has already raised over $76,000.

Continue reading Adorable dungeon crawl board game hits Kickstarter, has big Dark Crystal energy
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games, Best family board games, Best tile games
title: Adorable dungeon crawl board game hits Kickstarter, has big Dark Crystal energy

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Which Warhammer 40k codex releases are coming in 2025? 29 armies have now received their 10th edition codex (or at least an index update) - with another just about to drop, and more certain to come later. We're keeping this guide stocked with all the 10th edition codex release dates we know are coming in 2025 and beyond, and the latest new releases too. There's also handy info on how to use your codexes, and links to our army guides.

Continue reading All Warhammer 40k Codex release dates in 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: All Warhammer 40k Codex release dates in 2025

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Lumra, Bellow of the Woods has seen a steady rise in value over the last month. Just before Edge of Eternities came out, this card was priced at $13, but since then it has moved up to $27, according to the price checker on MTG Goldfish.

Foils show almost exactly the same pattern, while more expensive variants have reached new heights. For instance, the borderless version with alternate art has jumped from $30 to $50.

Continue reading MTG card that's a powerhouse in landfall decks doubles in price
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to pla
title: MTG card that's a powerhouse in landfall decks doubles in price

author: Timothy Linward
description:
When is Warhammer 40k 11th edition coming out? The next edition of Warhammer 40,000 is almost certain to be in the works at Games Workshop, and will likely be released in summer 2026. The firm hasn't yet announced it's working on a new edition of its flagship sci-fi wargame, but unless it has abandoned its strategy of releasing new editions of 40k every three years, work must already be underway. Here’s everything we can infer about the new edition, based on what we know about Games Workshop.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k 11th edition guide - predictions for 2026
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Warhammer 40k 11th edition guide - predictions for 2026
